title: Petroperu Bonds Slump to Two-Year Low on Restructuring Reports
description: Bonds of Petroleos del Peru SA plunged on Friday following reports that Peru is weighing filing for bankruptcy of the struggling state-owned company.
content: Bonds of Petroleos del Peru SA plunged on Friday following reports that Peru is weighing filing for bankruptcy of the struggling state-owned company.
